mapper.insert: INSERT INTO costip(costipno, memberno, title, content, recom, score, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES(costip_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{recom}, #{score}, #{cnt}, #{replycnt}, #{passwd}, #{word}, sysdate,#{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT costipno, memberno, title, content, recom, score, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM costip ORDER BY costipno DESC
